method.name: SetElevation
method.comment: Set the Elevation for the View

method.name: GetElevation
method.comment: Gets the Elevation for the View

method.name: GetStdActionBarHeight
method.comment: Gets the standard ActionBar Height. Since Gingerbread does not have an ActionBar it will return 0 for Android < 3.0.

method.name: GetNavigationBarHeight
method.comment: Gets the navigation bar height

method.name: GetThemeAttribute
method.comment:
Tries to get the value of a Theme attribute, like colorPrimary, colorPrimaryDark, colorPrimaryAccent. If the attribute is not found -1 is returned.
AttributeName - Name of the attribute to find

method.name: GetMaterialActionBarHeight
method.comment: Gets the ActionBar Height as definded in the Material Design style guide

method.name: GetStatusBarHeight
method.comment: Gets the status bar height

method.name: SetClickEffect
method.comment:
Sets a click-effect for a view. Will use ripple effect on Lollipop or later and a normal click colorchange on earlier android versions.
View - View to set the effect for Borderless - Should the effect be borderless?

class.name: de.amberhome.objects.appcompat.ACToolbarLightWrapper

method.name: DesignerCreateView
method.comment: This method is only for the B4A Designer. Don't call it directly

method.name: GetView
method.comment: Gets the view for the given Index

method.name: AddView
method.comment: Add a view to the ToolBar. The width is the available space between an Icon/Logo on the left and the actions on the right.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object.

method.name: GetAllViewsRecursive
method.comment: Gets all Views added to the Toolbar.

method.name: InitMenuListener
method.comment: Reinitializes the Menu listener. This is necessary if you set the ToolBar as your activities ActionBar and you want to customize the menu at runtime.

method.name: SetLayout
method.comment: Changes the View position and size.

method.name: RemoveViewAt
method.comment: Remove view with the given Index

method.name: SetVisibleAnimated
method.comment: Fade the view in or out

method.name: SetAsActionBar
method.comment: Set this Toolbar as the activity main ActionBar

method.name: Invalidate3
method.comment: Invalidate part of the object

method.name: Invalidate2
method.comment: Invalidate a rectangualar part of the object

method.name: SetColorAnimated
method.comment: Animate the color to a new value

method.name: RemoveAllViews
method.comment: Remove all views from the ToolBar

method.name: SetLayoutAnimated
method.comment:
Similar to SetLayout. Animates the change. Note that the animation will only be applied when running on Android 3+ devices.
Duration - duration of the layout change

property.name: MinHeight
property.comment: Sets or gets the minimum height of the ToolBar. The MinHeight property is handled in a special way on ToolBars. The Overflow menu button and the navigation item are vertically centered relative to the MinHeight. So if you have a ToolBar with a height of 112dip and a minheight of 56dip the Overflow menu and navigation item are placed in the upper half of the ToolBar. If you don't set MinHeight the items are placed centered relative to the whole ToolBar height.

property.name: Left
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's left position

property.name: NumberOfViews
property.comment: Returns the number of Views in this ToolBar

property.name: PopupTheme
property.comment:
Sets the Popup theme.
MUST be run before Toolbar.SetAsActionBar !

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's height

property.name: Menu
property.comment: Gets the menu of the ToolBar

property.name: TitleTextColor
property.comment: Sets the title text color

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's width

property.name: SubTitle
property.comment: Sets or gets the SubTitle of the Toolbar

property.name: LogoBitmap
property.comment: Sets a bitmap as a Logo. A logo in a toolbar is not clickable.

property.name: NavigationIconBitmap
property.comment: Sets the navigation item for the toolbar. This icon is clickable.

property.name: Title
property.comment: Sets or gets the Title of the Toolbar

property.name: Top
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's top position

property.name: NavigationIconDrawable
property.comment: Sets or gets the navigation icon for the toolbar. This icon is clickable.

property.name: SubTitleTextColor
property.comment: Sets the subtitle text color

property.name: LogoDrawable
property.comment: Sets or gets the Logo for the Toolbar. The logo is not clickable and is vertically centered in the toolbar.

class.designerProperty: key:PopupTheme, displayname:Popup Theme, fieldtype:string, defaultvalue:DEFAULT, list:DEFAULT|LIGHT|DARK
key:SetAsActionbar, displayname:Use as main Actionbar, fieldtype:boolean, defaultvalue:false

method.name: DesignerCreateView
method.comment: This method is only for the B4A Designer. Don't call it directly

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object

method.name: SetLayout
method.comment: Changes the View position and size.

method.name: SetVisibleAnimated
method.comment: Fade the view in or out

method.name: Invalidate3
method.comment: Invalidate part of the object

method.name: Invalidate2
method.comment: Invalidate a rectangualar part of the object

method.name: SetColorAnimated
method.comment: Animate the color to a new value

method.name: SetLayoutAnimated
method.comment:
Similar to SetLayout. Animates the change. Note that the animation will only be applied when running on Android 3+ devices.
Duration - duration of the layout change

property.name: ShowText
property.comment: Sets or gets whether the on/off text should be displayed.

property.name: Left
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's left position

property.name: TextOn
property.comment: Sets or gets the text displayed when the button is in the checked state.

property.name: Top
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's top position

property.name: TextOff
property.comment: Sets or gets the text displayed when the button is in the unchecked state.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's height

property.name: Width
property.comment: Gets or sets the view's width

class.designerProperty: key:ShowText, displayname:Show On/Off Text, fieldtype:boolean, defaultvalue:false

method.name: Add
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu
ItemId : Id for the item Title : Title for the item Icon : Bitmap that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: AddWithGroup2
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu and put this item into a group.
GroupId : Id of the group ItemId : Id for the item SortOrder : Sort order id Title : Title for the item Icon : Drawable that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: Size
method.comment: Returns the number of items in the menu

method.name: SetGroupCheckable
method.comment:
Make all items in the group checkable
GroupId : Id of the group Checkable : True or False to make the group checkable or not Exclusive : If set to True only one item can be checked at a time. All other items will be unchecked.

method.name: RemoveGroup
method.comment:
Remove the group from the menu
GroupId : the group to remove

method.name: SetGroupEnabled
method.comment:
Make the given group enabled/disabled
GroupId : Id of the group Enable : True or False to enable/disable the group

method.name: Add2
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu
ItemId : Id for the item SortOrder : Sort order id Title : Title for the item Icon : Drawable that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Clears all menu items from the menu.

method.name: GetItem
method.comment: returns the item with the given index.

method.name: RemoveItem
method.comment:
Remove Item from menu
ItemId : item to be removed

method.name: AddSubMenu
method.comment:
Add a Submenu to the menu.
GroupId : Id for the group ItemId : Id for the item SortOrder : Sort order id Title : title of the menu

method.name: FindItem
method.comment:
returns the item with the given Id. Returns null if the item cannot be found.
ItemId : Id of the item to be searched for.

method.name: SetGroupVisible
method.comment:
Make the given group visible/invisible
GroupId : Id of the group Visible : True or False to make the group visible/invisible

method.name: Close
method.comment: Close the menu if it is open.

method.name: AddWithGroup
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu and put this item into a group
GroupId : Id of the group ItemId : Id for the item Title : Title for the item Icon : Bitmap that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: GetItem
method.comment: Get the Menu Item Object for a given Id

method.name: AddMenuItem
method.comment:
Add a new menu item and then returns it.
ItemId: Id for the menu item Title: Title for the menu Icon: Drawable to be shown as menu icon

method.name: Show
method.comment: Show the popup menu.

method.name: Close
method.comment: Close the Popup menu

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initialize the PopupMenu
EventName: Name for the events View: Anchor View which is used for the PopupMenu position

method.name: RemoveMenuItem
method.comment:
Remove menu item
ItemId: Item to be removed

method.name: GetMenu
method.comment: Gets the menu object

method.name: Add
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu
ItemId : Id for the item Title : Title for the item Icon : Bitmap that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: AddWithGroup2
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu and put this item into a group.
GroupId : Id of the group ItemId : Id for the item SortOrder : Sort order id Title : Title for the item Icon : Drawable that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: Size
method.comment: Returns the number of items in the menu

method.name: SetGroupCheckable
method.comment:
Make all items in the group checkable
GroupId : Id of the group Checkable : True or False to make the group checkable or not Exclusive : If set to True only one item can be checked at a time. All other items will be unchecked.

method.name: RemoveGroup
method.comment:
Remove the group from the menu
GroupId : the group to remove

method.name: SetGroupEnabled
method.comment:
Make the given group enabled/disabled
GroupId : Id of the group Enable : True or False to enable/disable the group

method.name: Add2
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu
ItemId : Id for the item SortOrder : Sort order id Title : Title for the item Icon : Drawable that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Clears all menu items from the menu.

method.name: GetItem
method.comment: returns the item with the given index.

method.name: RemoveItem
method.comment:
Remove Item from menu
ItemId : item to be removed

method.name: AddSubMenu
method.comment:
Add a Submenu to the menu.
GroupId : Id for the group ItemId : Id for the item SortOrder : Sort order id Title : title of the menu

method.name: FindItem
method.comment:
returns the item with the given Id. Returns null if the item cannot be found.
ItemId : Id of the item to be searched for.

method.name: SetGroupVisible
method.comment:
Make the given group visible/invisible
GroupId : Id of the group Visible : True or False to make the group visible/invisible

method.name: Close
method.comment: Close the menu if it is open.

method.name: AddWithGroup
method.comment:
Add a menu item to the menu and put this item into a group
GroupId : Id of the group ItemId : Id for the item Title : Title for the item Icon : Bitmap that is used as an icon. Pass null for no icon.

property.name: ActionView
property.comment: Set an ActionView for this menu item.

property.name: Enabled
property.comment: Enable/disable the item

property.name: Title
property.comment: Sets/gets the title of the menu

property.name: SubMenu
property.comment: Gets the Submenu of this item if it has one.

property.name: GroupId
property.comment: Gets the group id of the item.

property.name: Checked
property.comment: Check the item

property.name: ShowAsAction
property.comment: Show menu item as action if possible.

property.name: SearchView
property.comment:
Connects a SearchView to this MenuItem.
SearchView: Instance of a SearchView object

property.name: Visible
property.comment: Show/hide the item

property.name: ItemCollapsed
property.comment: Set/get the item to collapsed mode. (For the SearchView for example)

property.name: Icon
property.comment:
Sets or gets the Icon for the menu item.
Icon : Icon drawable

property.name: Checkable
property.comment: Make the item checkable

property.name: Id
property.comment: Gets the item id

method.comment: Initializes the object

property.name: Subtitle
property.comment: Sets or gets the subtitle of the ActionBar

property.name: Elevation
property.comment: Sets or gets the elevation of the ActionBar. Does only have an effect on Android 5.0 and above.

property.name: TitleVisible
property.comment: Show/Hide the title

property.name: UpIndicatorDrawable
property.comment:
Set the up indicator drawable. Useful for implementing the NavigationDrawer pattern.
Icon: Drawable to be used for the Icon

property.name: Title
property.comment: Sets or gets the title of the ActionBar

property.name: Icon
property.comment:
Set the icon of the ActionBar
Drawable to be used for the Home Icon

property.name: UpIndicatorBitmap
property.comment:
Set the up indicator bitmap. Useful for implementing the NavigationDrawer pattern.
Bitmap: Bitmap to be used for the Icon

property.name: HomeVisible
property.comment: Show/Hide the home icon

property.name: Logo
property.comment: Set a logo as icon
